name: Tetris With Physics (Data.EXE)
description:
Tetris but with physics!

There are four types of pieces: 

  • Basic: Nothing special just a basic block!
  • Bouncy: These pieces are alot more bouncy then the regular ones and alot less predictable.
  • Friction: These pieces have high friction and low bounce so they will usally stay where you put them!
  • Bomb: The most uniqe of the other pieces (and the most complicated). The bomb will show up every 15 pieces (on medium difficulty), the bomb will destroy all peices that match color with the peice the bomb collides with.

Controls

  • Move Piece: WASD/Arrows
  • Rotate Piece: R
  • Drop Piece: Space/Enter

Other notes

  • I made this game in two days so it may not be perfect
  • If you find any bugs or have feature requests leave a comment
  • I may update in the future if I feel like it
  • There is currently no sound or music
  • Im 90% sure impossible mode is actuly imposible
  • Not the best game in the world but its better than the other tetris with physics games I found
